entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
